title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 61 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 61 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗，交与伶长，用丝弦的乐器）神阿，求你听我的呼求，侧耳听我的祷告。

lineList.en: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
lineList.cn: 我心里发昏的时候，我要从地极求告你。求你领我到那比我更高的磐石。

lineList.en: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.
lineList.cn: 因为你作过我的避难所，作过我的坚固台，脱离仇敌。

lineList.en: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.
lineList.cn: 我要永远住在你的帐幕里。我要投靠在你翅膀下的隐密处。（细拉）

lineList.en: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你原是听了我所许的愿。你将产业赐给敬畏你名的人。

lineList.en: Thou wilt prolong the king's life: and his years as many generations.
lineList.cn: 你要加添王的寿数。他的年岁必存到世世。

lineList.en: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.
lineList.cn: 他必永远坐在神面前。愿你豫备慈爱和诚实保佑他。

lineList.en: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
lineList.cn: 这样，我要歌颂你的名直到永远，好天天还我所许的愿。
